description: A platform where a group of friends can upload assignments, download them for submission, and mark submitted assignments. Implemented JWT authentication for secure user sessions.

details.challenges: Implementing JWT token-based authentication was the most challenging part, ensuring secure session management and protected routes.
details.improvements: The UI could be enhanced for better user experience, and additional features like notifications for assignment deadlines could be added.

description: A crowd-funding platform where users can create campaigns, contribute to campaigns, and track funding progress in real-time.

details.challenges: Handling real-time updates for funding progress and ensuring data consistency across different user sessions were major hurdles.
details.improvements: Improved campaign analytics and the addition of social media sharing features are planned for the next version.

description: A winter clothing donation platform where users can register as donors or recipients, track donation history, and manage events.

details.challenges: Coordinating the registration process for both donors and recipients while maintaining a user-friendly interface was quite complex.
details.improvements: Future plans include adding a notification system to remind users of upcoming donation events and integrating an AI-based matching system for efficient distribution.
